body_html: @glample -- yeah CuDNN will complain that things aren't contiguous but it will not go ahead and make it contiguous for you. This is just part of the interface/precondition for using it, and maybe allocating memory to make it contiguous would make CuDNN slow, so they don't do it.
body_text: @glample -- yeah CuDNN will complain that things aren't contiguous but it will not go ahead and make it contiguous for you. This is just part of the interface/precondition for using it, and maybe allocating memory to make it contiguous would make CuDNN slow, so they don't do it.
body: @glample -- yeah CuDNN will complain that things aren't contiguous but it will not go ahead and make it contiguous for you. This is just part of the interface/precondition for using it, and maybe allocating memory to make it contiguous would make CuDNN slow, so they don't do it.
